title: Google\Cloud\Sql\V1beta4\ImportContext
name: ImportContext
description:
Database instance import context.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.sql.v1beta4.ImportContext

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.uri
params.description: Path to the import file in Cloud Storage, in the form gs://bucketName/fileName. Compressed gzip files (.gz) are supported when fileType is SQL. The instance must have write permissions to the bucket and read access to the file.

params.name: data.database
params.description: The target database for the import. If fileType is SQL, this field is required only if the import file does not specify a database, and is overridden by any database specification in the import file. If fileType is CSV, one database must be specified.

params.name: data.file_type
params.description: The file type for the specified uri. SQL: The file contains SQL statements. CSV: The file contains CSV data. * BAK: The file contains backup data for a SQL Server instance.

params.name: data.import_user
params.description: The PostgreSQL user for this import operation. PostgreSQL instances only.

params.name: data.bak_import_options
params.description: Import parameters specific to SQL Server .BAK files
